releaseNotes: Fix: Event repeat schedule — events only appear on their scheduled days
Fix: Daily Fluid Trend chart bars now display correctly on all screens including Retina/HiDPI
Fix: Upcoming Appointment card — time inline with Edit/Delete buttons, Reason full-width below
Fix: Doctor's Report — diagnosis tags wrap horizontally instead of stacking
Fix: Doctor's Report — out-of-range readings show dated table instead of HIGH, HIGH, HIGH...
